title: E364 Jesse Ventura
itunes:title: Jesse Ventura
description:
Jesse Ventura is the former governor of Minnesota, professional wrestler and political commentator. Theo talks with Jesse about his time with the military, being a security guard for the Rolling Stones, conspiracy theories, and his time as the Minnesota governor.

We shot this episode last minute on the road in Minnesota at a lovely hotel. Big thank you to the staff at AmericInn Lodge & Suites: https://www.wyndhamhotels.com/americinn/white-bear-lake-minnesota/americinn-lodge-and-suites-white-bear-lake-st-paul/overview
